page.title: 16POPULATION IN PANTON
page.content: {PANTON }is a scattered small community and at the moment there are no plans for any new house building and therefore the population is fairly static. Most of the present residents have moved into the area in recent years and none spent their childhood in {PANTON.}The majority of people in {PANTON}belong to a family group and only two people live alone.One moved here recently and rears goats. He moved into a house formerly occupied by an elderly man who lived alone and died there. The youngest member of the area is under one year old and the oldest is just over sixty.The rest of the population comprises a cross-section of ages and backgrounds.
